item.title: Hugo Site CI/CD
item.description: the goal: build a hugo site locally, create a github repo to store it, and set up ci/cd so that when I push the repo it automatically publishes to my uberspace asteroid and is accessible from a browser. despite the numerous guides online, including in uberspace’s wonderful documentation, nothing seemed to work for me correctly. what I ended up going with was an amalgam of different approaches, and I will outline them coherently here.
